author: Retro Game Corps
description:
As the first handheld to release with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, the Odin 3 is currently the most powerful Android handheld in the world.  Let's check it out and see if it's an upgrade from the beloved Odin 2 handhelds.

Buy one here: https://tinyurl.com/RGC-Odin3
Android handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/I4mqgcDYZFo

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this video ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:

Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore

Timestamps:
00:00 introduction
01:10 specs and price
04:23 unboxing and impressions
06:35 size comparisons
08:40 controls and audio
14:41 ergonomics and comfort
16:42 accessories
17:4
title: Odin 3 Impressions: Return of the King
